revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 53:;Kephalas, son of Anchorymphis (Nausis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;(in left margin: obols 28) eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 5.5;;Horos, son of Horos, grandson of Horos, mother Taharmothes, drachmas 8;;Demo, daughter of Syrion (the son of Paulinus);;(in left margin: drachmas 60 obols 25) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 10 obol 0.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 3, naubion drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 14 obol 1, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1, kollybos obols 3 chalki 2, in total 31 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 26 obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 4 chalki 2;;Gaius Valerius Paulinus;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Pasion, son of Petheus, grandson of Kames, mother Zoidous drachmas 12 copper drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 196 obols 24;;(Pharmouthi) 14 likewise:;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Taorion, drachmas 4;;Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Valerius, fatherless, mother Valeria, drachmas 4;;Sambous, daughter of Phanomgeus (Touamkiamoul);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 28) eparourion drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 8; ;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis, obols 28;;Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Kames, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Ptollion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Kames, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Pakysis, son of Kalatytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Tkateis, daughter of Naaraus (Petaus, priest of Kolokasis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 8 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 1.5, naubion obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5 obols 5, surcharges obols 3, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 4.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 21 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obol 2.5, in total drachmas 23 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, drachmas 4;;Mystharion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
